# TOUCHSTONE INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

  # Create a folder that will be your Touchstone workspace (e.g. `touchstone-workspace`)
  # Install the design platform: download the archive and unzip it in your Touchstone workspace to get the `design-platform` folder.
  # Install the run platform: download the archive and unzip it in your Touchstone workspace to get the `run-platform` folder. Then go to `run-platform` and use the command: `./build.sh all` or (`.\build.bat all` for Windows users).
